forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
The morning sun casts a gentle glow over Downtown San Francisco, an awakening city cradled by the bay. The forecast promises a lovely day ahead with highs near 67, dipping slightly as afternoon rolls in. The air is fresh, mingling the salty tendrils of the sea breeze with the warmth of the sun, as west-southwest winds whisper at a steady pace. While the sky remains largely clear, a few playful clouds dance here and there, remnants of the marine layer that might still be lingering high above the Golden Gate.

As the day unfolds, it will be wise to don layers—perhaps a light sweater over a short-sleeve shirt to embrace the coolness that can sneak up unexpectedly. The evening will bring a gentle cool, settling around 56, inviting strolls among the twinkling lights of the city’s streets or perhaps a cozy gathering over coffee. With such splendid weather, one might find joy in exploring local galleries or taking a leisurely walk by the waterfront, absorbing the vibrant life that pulses through this iconic locale. Whether you choose to wander down to the park or simply find a sunny spot to savor a book, today offers a delicate harmony that invites both serenity and exploration.
